sentence.Network_en: Children would settle disputes by trading punches or insults in the schoolyard.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童会通过在操场上对打或互骂的方式解决争端。

sentence.Network_en: The superintendent swaggered into the schoolyard.
sentence.Network_cn: 督学阔步高视地走进校园.

sentence.Network_en: I ran faster than ever, reaching the schoolyard quite out of breath.
sentence.Network_cn: 我跑得更快了, 到了校园时上气不接下气了.

entry.def: The schoolyard is the large open area with a hard surface just outside a school building, where the schoolchildren can play and do other activities.

example.ex: ...the sound of the kids in the schoolyard.
example.tran: 操场上孩子们的叫喊声

means.word_mean: 1. the yard associated with a school

Sentence.sentence: As they walk around a playground or other area, text, video or audio pops up at various points to help them try to figure out why aliens were in the schoolyard.
